policies.termsContent: Welcome to PoolCare Pro. By using our services, you agree to these terms. These terms govern your use of our application and any related services provided by us. You agree to use our service responsibly and in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. You must not use our service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. The content you create, upload, or share is your responsibility. We may terminate or suspend your access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
policies.privacyContent: Your privacy is important to us. It is PoolCare Pro's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our application. We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used. We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
